name: R5-PropertyType-R4-PropertyType
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 PropertyType into FHIR R4

element.display: The property value is a boolean true | false.

target.display: The property value is a boolean true | false.

element.display: The property value is a code that identifies a concept defined in the code system.

target.display: The property value is a code that identifies a concept defined in the code system.

element.display: The property  value is a code defined in an external code system. This may be used for translations, but is not the intent.

target.display: The property  value is a code defined in an external code system. This may be used for translations, but is not the intent.

element.display: The property is a date or a date + time.

target.display: The property is a date or a date + time.

element.display: The property value is a decimal number.

target.display: The property value is a decimal number.

element.display: The property value is an integer (often used to assign ranking values to concepts for supporting score assessments).

target.display: The property value is a string (often used to assign ranking values to concepts for supporting score assessments).

element.display: The property value is a string.

target.display: The property value is a string.
